name: The fisherman is the village hero
name_original: The fisherman is the village hero
description:
This game is a submission for Ludum Dare 46 Note : Please for better experience, download the game

it’s fishing season and nobody is fishing and the villagers income not enough for them to get new fishing gear , you mission is to catch fish then sell it and slowly you start buying fishing gear for the people from your village so they keep the lake alive and also help with the village economy, in exchange they will give you a percentage of what they earn.

this game is more of a relaxing type of game and needs some time to explore the full content so please take your time and enjoy.

the game doesn't fit the theme directly, but it help you to get an idea and that was my idea
